description: Retrieves details about an API destination.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the API destination to retrieve.

nested_items.name: ApiDestinationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the API destination retrieved.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the API destination retrieved.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description for the API destination retrieved.

nested_items.name: ApiDestinationState
nested_items.description: The state of the API destination retrieved.

nested_items.name: ConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the connection specified for the API destination retrieved.

nested_items.name: InvocationEndpoint
nested_items.description: The URL to use to connect to the HTTP endpoint.

nested_items.name: HttpMethod
nested_items.description: The method to use to connect to the HTTP endpoint.

nested_items.name: InvocationRateLimitPerSecond
nested_items.description: The maximum number of invocations per second to specified for the API destination. Note that if you set the invocation rate maximum to a value lower the rate necessary to send all events received on to the destination HTTP endpoint, some events may not be delivered within the 24-hour retry window. If you plan to set the rate lower than the rate necessary to deliver all events, consider using a dead-letter queue to catch events that are not delivered within 24 hours.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the API destination was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the API destination was last modified.
